description.summary: System independent dlopen wrapper for GNU libtool
description.p: This package contains the run-time libltdl library.
A small library that aims at hiding the various difficulties of dlopening libraries from programmers. It is a system independent dlopen wrapper for GNU libtool.
It supports the following dlopen interfaces:

ul.li: dlopen (Solaris, Linux and various BSD flavors)
GNU DLD (emulates dynamic linking for static libraries)
